verses.verse: He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the steward of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4390>"Fill<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%>'s <S%H572>sacks<s%> with <S%H400>food,<s%> as much <S%H834>as<s%> they <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H5375>carry,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3701>money<s%> in his <S%H572>sack<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H7760>Put<s%> my <S%H1375>cup,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H1375>cup,<s%> in the <S%H572>sack<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6996>youngest,<s%> with his <S%H7668>grain<s%> <S%H3701>money.<s%>" He <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>
As soon as the <S%H1242>morning<s%> was <S%H215>light,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> were sent <S%H7971>away,<s%> they and their <S%H2543>donkeys.<s%>

When they had gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and were not yet far <S%H7368>off,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1004>steward,<s%> <S%H6965>"Up,<s%> <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H582>men.<s%> When you <S%H5381>overtake<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> ask <S%H7999>them,<s%> 'Why have you rewarded <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good?<s%>
<S%H113>Isn't<s%> this that from which my lord <S%H8354>drinks,<s%> and by which he <S%H5172>indeed<s%> <S%H5172>divines?<s%> You have done <S%H7489>evil<s%> in so <S%H6213>doing.<s%>'"
He <S%H5381>overtook<s%> <S%H1696>them,<s%> and he spoke <S%H428>these<s%> words to <S%H1697>them.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H113>him,<s%> "Why does my lord <S%H1696>speak<s%> such <S%H1697>words<s%> as <S%H2486>these?<s%> Far be it from your <S%H5650>servants<s%> that they should <S%H6213>do<s%> such a <S%H1697>thing!<s%>

<S%H3701>Behold,<s%> the money, which we <S%H4672>found<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%>' <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> we brought <S%H7725>again<s%> to you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> How then should we <S%H1589>steal<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%> out of your <S%H113>lord<s%>'s <S%H1004>house?<s%>
With whomever of your <S%H5650>servants<s%> it is <S%H4672>found,<s%> let him <S%H4191>die,<s%> and we also will be my <S%H113>lord<s%>'s <S%H5650>bondservants.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Now also let it be according to your <S%H3651>words:<s%> he with whom it is <S%H4672>found<s%> will be my <S%H5650>bondservant;<s%> and you will be <S%H5355>blameless.<s%>"
Then they <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and each <S%H376>man<s%> took his <S%H572>sack<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and each <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H572>sack.<s%>

He <S%H2664>searched,<s%> <S%H2490>beginning<s%> with the <S%H1419>eldest,<s%> and <S%H3615>ending<s%> at the <S%H6996>youngest.<s%> The <S%H1375>cup<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>'s <S%H572>sack.<s%>
Then they <S%H7167>tore<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and each <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6006>loaded<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he was still <S%H5307>there.<s%> They fell on the <S%H776>ground<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4639>them,<s%> "What deed is this that you have <S%H6213>done?<s%> <S%H3045>Don't<s%> you know that such a <S%H376>man<s%> as I can indeed <S%H5172>divine?<s%>"

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What will we tell my <S%H113>lord?<s%> What will we <S%H1696>speak?<s%> Or how will we clear <S%H6663>ourselves?<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has found <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants.<s%> <S%H113>Behold,<s%> we are my lord's <S%H5650>bondservants,<s%> both <S%H1571>we,<s%> and he also in <S%H834>whose<s%> hand the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Far be <S%H2486>it<s%> from me that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>so.<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> in whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found,<s%> he will be my <S%H5650>bondservant;<s%> but as for <S%H5927>you,<s%> go up in <S%H7965>peace<s%> to your <S%H1>father.<s%>"

Then <S%H3063>Judah<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H994>"Oh,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> please let your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in my <S%H113>lord<s%>'s <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H639>don't<s%> let your anger <S%H2734>burn<s%> against your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for you are even as <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3426><s%> 'Have you a <S%H1>father,<s%> or a <S%H251>brother?<s%>'

We <S%H559>said<s%> to my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H3426><s%> 'We have a <S%H1>father,<s%> an old <S%H2205>man,<s%> and a <S%H3206>child<s%> of his old <S%H2208>age,<s%> a little <S%H6996>one;<s%> and his <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and he alone is <S%H3498>left<s%> of his <S%H517>mother;<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> loves <S%H157>him.<s%>'
You <S%H559>said<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3381><s%> 'Bring him down to <S%H7760>me,<s%> that I may set my eyes on <S%H5869>him.<s%>'

We <S%H559>said<s%> to my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H3201><s%> 'The boy can't <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> for if he should <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> would <S%H4191>die.<s%>'

You <S%H559>said<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> 'Unless your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> comes <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H3254>you,<s%> you will see my <S%H6440>face<s%> no <S%H7200>more.<s%>'
It happened when we came <S%H5927>up<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> we <S%H5046>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>
Our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Go again, <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>'

We <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3201><s%> 'We can't go <S%H3381>down.<s%> If our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3426>is<s%> with <S%H3381>us,<s%> then we will go down: for we <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H369>unless<s%> our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> brother is with <S%H251>us.<s%>'
Your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3045>us,<s%> 'You know that my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> me two <S%H8147>sons:<s%>
and the <S%H259>one<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H559>me,<s%> and I said, <S%H2963>"Surely<s%> he is torn in <S%H2963>pieces;<s%>" and I <S%H7200>haven't<s%> seen him <S%H2008>since.<s%>

If you <S%H3947>take<s%> this one also <S%H5973>from<s%> <S%H6440>me,<s%> and <S%H611>harm<s%> happens to <S%H7136>him,<s%> you will bring <S%H3381>down<s%> my gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> with <S%H7451>sorrow<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>'

Now therefore when I <S%H935>come<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and the <S%H5288>boy<s%> is not with <S%H5315>us;<s%> since his life is bound <S%H7194>up<s%> in the <S%H5315>boy<s%>'s life;

it will <S%H7200>happen,<s%> when he sees that the <S%H5288>boy<s%> is no <S%H4191>more,<s%> that he will die. Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will bring <S%H3381>down<s%> the gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> our <S%H1>father,<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

For your <S%H5650>servant<s%> became <S%H6148>collateral<s%> for the <S%H5288>boy<s%> <S%H5973>to<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935><s%> 'If I don't bring him to <S%H2398>you,<s%> then I will bear the blame to my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3117>forever.<s%>'

Now <S%H5650>therefore,<s%> please let your servant <S%H3427>stay<s%> instead of the <S%H5288>boy,<s%> a <S%H5650>bondservant<s%> to my <S%H113>lord;<s%> and let the <S%H5288>boy<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

For <S%H349>how<s%> will I go <S%H5927>up<s%> to my <S%H1>father,<s%> if the <S%H5288>boy<s%> <S%H7200>isn't<s%> with me?â€”lest I see the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that will come <S%H4672>on<s%> my <S%H1>father.<s%>"
